description: This file initializes a vector database with a PDF knowledge base, then creates an agent to interact with it, specifically for Thai recipes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs actions based on user input.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from a PDF URL and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A class representing the Qdrant vector database used for storing and querying vectors.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent, optionally formatted in markdown.

calls: agent.print_response("List down the ingredients to make Massaman Gai", markdown=True)
